## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Plant at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-6.5, 0.0) connected to offshore pump via pipes
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 0.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=818) connecting to all mining drills

### Secondary Power Plant at position (-15.5, -3.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-15.5, -3.5)
- Boiler at (-12.0, -4.5) connected to offshore pump via pipes (currently fueled with coal)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, -4.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=5262) connecting to mining drills

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- 5 Electric mining drills at:
  - (15.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
  - (18.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
  - (21.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
  - (24.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
  - (27.5, 70.5) with output blocked warning
- 5 Iron smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 68.0) - no fuel
  - (25.0, 68.0) - no fuel
  - (28.0, 68.0) - no fuel
- 5 Steel smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 65.0) - no fuel
  - (25.0, 65.0) - no fuel
  - (28.0, 65.0) - no fuel
- 5 Burner inserters between iron and steel furnaces at:
  - (16.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
  - (19.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
  - (22.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
  - (25.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
  - (28.5, 66.5) - waiting for source items
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 73.5)
- Burner inserter at (16.5, 72.5) - waiting for source items

## ERROR TIPS

### Belt connection errors (repeated 6 times)
- Transport belts cannot be connected directly from chests - always use inserters as intermediaries
- When connecting belts between entities, verify the target entity can accept direct belt input
- Ensure valid path exists between source and destination before attempting belt connections

### Placement errors (repeated 4 times)
- Verify position is empty before placing new entities (wooden chest at (15.5, 73.5) already exists)
- When using place_entity_next_to(), adjust spacing or direction if placement fails due to existing objects

### Furnace operation issues
- 3 furnaces are out of fuel at positions (22.0, 65.0), (25.0, 65.0), (28.0, 65.0)
- All furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" warnings - need to connect mining output to furnaces
- Don't overfill furnace fuel slots (50 coal is maximum capacity)

### Mining drill output issues
- All 5 mining drills show "output blocked" warnings - need to:
  - Connect output to furnaces via belts/inserters
  - Or provide chests with working inserters to collect output
- Current inserter at (16.5, 72.5) is waiting for source items - verify connection to mining drill

### Inserter operation problems
- All burner inserters between furnaces are waiting for source items
- Verify inserter pickup/drop positions are correctly aligned with furnace input/output slots
- Ensure inserters have sufficient fuel (coal) to operate

### Power distribution
- Verify all mining drills are properly connected to power network
- Check power production meets demand (current throughput shows no production)
